<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Ra (King of the Heavens)](/Deities.aspx?ID=57)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="LN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 124 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Ancient Osirian Gods
](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=3)

**Edicts** Bring order to places of chaos, kill evil monsters and fiends, encourage just laws, provide warmth where needed

**Anathema** Avoid personal change, kill a plant or a creature with cold damage, seal a building to completely block sunlight

**Follower Alignments**
LG, LN, N

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Intelligence

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)

**Favored Weapon** [Spear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=10)

**Domains** [Fire](/Domains.aspx?ID=13), [Nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=22), [Sun](/Domains.aspx?ID=29), [Time](/Domains.aspx?ID=54)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Burning Hands](/Spells.aspx?ID=30)

- **2nd**
[Flaming Sphere](/Spells.aspx?ID=121)

- **3rd**
[Threefold Aspect](/Spells.aspx?ID=723)

</column>
name: Ra (King of the Heavens)
